name: 2D Breakout
description:
Controls:

"A" - Move Left

"D" - Move Right

"R" - Reset Ball

(Note: 2 HP is added with the completion of each stage)

Attributions:

Music - 4 Chiptunes (Adventure), by SubspaceAudio (https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure)

Sound Effects - Atmospheric Interaction Sound Pack by legoluft (https://opengameart.org/content/atmospheric-interaction-sound-pack)

Font - 3x5 by K-Type (https://www.1001freefonts.com/3x5.font)
